title: Wednesday Arktoons
author: VD
content_html:
ALT★HERO Episode 35: God-Given Right

THE STRANDED Episode 1: To Kick Alien Ass

SAVAGE MEMES Episode 54: Evolution

SOMETHING BIG Episode 24: Know Your Role

SHOTGUN SAMURAI Episode 3: Tofu the Ninja 2

CHATEAU GRIEF Episode 32: Triple Mugging

CLASSIC BIBLE TALES Episode 22: Parable of the Wise and Foolish Maidens

Today we’re introducing THE STRANDED, a classic comic series in which The Legend Chuck Dixon uncharacteristically delves into science fiction. The original was published in black-and-white, the Arktoons version has been colored by our expert digital production team.
